Name: The Fool
About the game: Who said that only brave knights on white stallions can become Heroes? Witness the incredible adventures of a rustic Fool; travel with him to a fascinating world and help him save the beautiful princess Catherine from the jaws of a terrible dragon. A Hero lives in every one of us! Journey to set your Hero free! – Help the Fool defeat the beastly dragon. – Visit the land of zombies. – Travel to Steam City – the steampunk industrial center in decline. – Unveil a kingdom floating in the clouds and solve the mystery behind the UFO. – Locate dragon's lair and save princess Catherine. – Become a Hero! – Many ingenious puzzles and subtle humor!
